comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historical-Traditional-Oriental ( Post 4 Comment 2 ), and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 30624567@N03
comment._content:
What I love best about this shot, are that the spindles on the staircase are identical to the ones in my house - built two years ago.
Three years ago, we'd have gasped at the wallpaper - now it's positively trendy!
I love all these shots!

comment.author: 57452096@N00
comment._content: awww, reminds me of the staircase in the big Victorian house I grew up in.Every few years mama would choose a new wallpaper, and a friendly old guy like the one in the picture would come in and paste it up while I played on the stairs and watched him. Those were more gentile times.
